subject: Re: [junit] HTML testing
msgSnippet: ... Strangely enough, you can try HtmlUnit! Do you just want to test HTML or do you want to test your entire application using form submissions? Read _JUnit
messageBody:
andi mochtar wrote:

> Is there any one knows how to test HTML in JUnit? Which part of JUnit
> that can I use for HTML testing.

Strangely enough, you can try HtmlUnit!

Do you just want to test HTML or do you want to test your entire
application using form submissions? Read _JUnit Recipes_, Chapters 12
and 13.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
